prop.name: minValue
prop.desc: The lower value of some characteristic or property.

prop.name: currency
prop.desc: The currency in which the monetary amount is expressed (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format).

prop.name: value
prop.desc:
The value of the quantitative value or property value node.

  • For QuantitativeValue and MonetaryAmount, the recommended type for values is 'Number'.
  • For PropertyValue, it can be 'Text;', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.

prop.name: validFrom
prop.desc: The date when the item becomes valid.

prop.name: validThrough
prop.desc: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

prop.name: maxValue
prop.desc: The upper value of some characteristic or property.
